long_description: The ASICS Favorite long-sleeve T-shirt helps you enjoy your workout in soft, high-performance fabric with UV protection and odor resistance. Polyester and spandex fabric provides breathability and moisture management. Mesh construction increases cooling ventilation; antimicrobial treatment resists odors. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Flat seams reduce chafing, and thumbholes secure sleeves over wrists for warmth on cool runs. Reflective logo. The semifitted ASICS Favorite long-sleeve T-shirt is not too tight and not too loose.
short_description: The ASICS Favorite long-sleeve T-shirt helps you enjoy your workout in soft, high-performance fabric with UV protection and odor resistance.
